NineCMDSign.description: Server support for Nine Chronicles via Python and Flask
NineCMDSign.content: The server helps to sign the transactions you send to, use free Pythonanywhere cloud storage service.

Chrono.content: This is a crypto wallet service of chrome extension for Nine Chronicles blockchain, designed to provide users with a seamless experience in managing their assets on the Nine Chronicles blockchain.

@--views--ArenaMain-vue.messageJoinArenaFirst: Join Arena and use 1 ticket first, will support later ...

popconfirm.refillAP-info-2: The time calculated by blocks to re-fill the action bar
popconfirm.AP-info-2: Action Potion (AP) will decrease when you take a specific action.
popconfirm.costAP-info: Cost AP: {costAP} (haven't staked yet) | Cost AP: {costAP} ({stakeNCG} NCG staked) | Cost AP: {costAP} ({stakeNCG} NCGs staked)
popconfirm.NCG-info: NCG is the main currency, earning activities in the game or buying P2P from other players.
popconfirm.NCG-have: No money :D | Have {NCG} NCG | Have {NCG} NCGs
popconfirm.Crystal-info: Crystal is used to cost joining Arena Season, World Boss, unlock new world and formula craft, compensate for the material is not enough.
popconfirm.Crystal-have: No money :D | Have {Crystal} crystal | Have {Crystal} crystals
popconfirm.stake-NCG-have: Haven't staked yet | Staked {NCG} NCG | Stake {NCG} NCGs
popconfirm.stake-NCG-info: Stake NCG will receive weekly rewards, increase Arena season rewards and many other benefits.
popconfirm.ticket-arena-info: Free Arena tickets will be refresh after each round (default 8), no reserve for next round.
popconfirm.ticket-arena-have: Out of free tickets | Have free {ticket} ticket | Have free {ticket} tickets
popconfirm.ticket-arena-buy-info: You can buy more arena tickets, limited in each round (default 8), people often buy tickets for the last 5 rounds before the end of the season ðŸ˜‰.
popconfirm.ticket-arena-buy-have: Not bought ticket yet | Bought {ticket} ticket | Bought {ticket} tickets
popconfirm.ticket-arena-bought-info: There is a limit to the total number of tickets that can be purchased in the season (default 40), in high rankings often buy maximum tickets.
popconfirm.ticket-arena-bought-have: Not bought ticket yet | Bought {ticket} ticket | Bought {ticket} tickets

placeholder.timeoutUseNode: No timeout | Timeout min {TIMEOUT_USE_NODE} second | Timeout min {TIMEOUT_USE_NODE} seconds

message.createMessageErrorNoSuccess: You need to creat {action} manual in game
